text: The Arrows of Robin Hood () is a 1975 Soviet adventure movie directed by Sergei TarasovСтрелы Робин ГудаСТРЕЛЫ РОБИН ГУДА and stars Boris Khmelnitsky, Regīna Razuma, and Vija Artmane. ==Actors== * Boris Khmelnitsky as Robin Good (voiced by Alexander Belyavsky) * Regīna Razuma as Maria * Vija Artmane as Kat * Eduards Pāvuls as Friar Tuck * Hariy Shveiyts as Little John * Algimantas Masyulis as Guy of Gisbourne * Yuri Kamornyj as jester «Стрелы Робин Гуда» // v-vysotsky.com * Juris Strenga as Bishop Gerford * Ints Burāns as Sir Ralph, Sheriff of Nottingham * Mirdza Martinsone as Lady Anna * Yanis Plesums as Alan == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1975 adventure movies Category:1970s historical movies Category:Russian adventure movies Category:Movies set in England Category:Movies set in forests Category:Movies set in castles Category:Movies directed by Sergei Tarasov
title: The Arrows of Robin Hood
